impostermod:Sus.NAME: Sus
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of turn, stun target if Sus greater than or equal to target's total attack intent (consumes all stacks of Sus).

impostermod:VotesPlayer.NAME: Vote(s)
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases attack damage (and block for the Imposter).  Votes trigger when there are at least 10 Votes among us: each creature takes damage equal to (10 * their number of Votes), then all Votes are removed.

impostermod:VotesEnemy.NAME: Vote(s)
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases attack damage (and block for the Imposter).  Votes trigger when there are at least 10 Votes among us: each creature takes damage equal to (10 * their number of Votes), then all Votes are removed.
